name: The Ghost (itch) (Kareem Adawy)
description:
Your little brother went to the hospital and never came back! Rumor says the hospital is controlled by a psycho doctor who won't let anyone out. You have to go there and FIGURE OUT what is really happening! DON'T GET CAUGHT!

Average playtime: 15-20 minutes

Key features:
  • A short creepy horror experience.
  • Unique adrenaline rush.
  • Atmospheric ambience.
  • Immersive sound design.
  • Volumetric lighting.
Controles:
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • Shift left to sprint.
  • G to grab.
  • F to hide.
